description:
Combination of two small bugs:

a) vpn list tries to access ec2_id which no longer exists

b) vpn ping fails to report status of vpns properly when run from the network host because the forwarding rules aren't hit.
title: nova-manage vpn list is broken

comments.content:
Combination of two small bugs:

a) vpn list tries to access ec2_id which no longer exists

b) vpn ping fails to report status of vpns properly when run from the network host because the forwarding rules aren't hit.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
